{"id":304760517,"lang":"c","lang_name":"C","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1582092970,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/304760517/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"7.8 MB","code":"\n\nint pivotIndex(int* nums, int numsSize){\n    int sum_all = 0;\n    int i = 0;\n    while(i < numsSize){\n        sum_all += nums[i++];\n    }\n    int sum_left = 0;\n    int sum_right = 0;\n    i = 0;\n    while(i < numsSize){\n        if(i > 0) sum_left += nums[i - 1];\n        sum_right = sum_all - (sum_left + nums[i]);\n        if(sum_left == sum_right) return i;\n        i++;\n    }\n    return -1;\n}\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
